Package controllers

Class ViewSubscriberDetailsController

java.lang.Object
controllers.ViewSubscriberDetailsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class ViewSubscriberDetailsController extends Object implements ClientAware
Controller for the screen that displays the subscriber's personal details. All fields are shown in read-only mode and populated using the ClientController, which holds the logged-in subscriber's data. The screen also provides a button that lets the user navigate to the "Edit Details" screen.

      public ViewSubscriberDetailsController()

  • Method Details

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ClientController client)
      Injects the central ClientController used for retrieving subscriber data and navigating to other screens.
      Specified by:
      setClient in interface ClientAware
      Parameters:
      client - the connected controller instance

    • setSubscriberAndPassword

      public void setSubscriberAndPassword()
      Loads the Subscriber object and password string from the client. This method must be called before calling #setLabels().

    • setLabels

      public void setLabels()
      Updates the screen labels with the subscriber's current details. Assumes #setSubscriberAndPassword() was called beforehand.

    • handleGoToEdit

      public void handleGoToEdit()
      Triggered when the user clicks the "Edit Details" button. Navigates to the EditSubscriberDetails screen via the SubscriberMainLayoutController.
